article: a full house has turned out at the directors guild of america for the l.a. premiere of the new documentary `` reel bad arabs , '' which makes the case that hollywood is obsessed with `` the three bs '' -- belly dancers , billionaire sheiks and bombers -- in a largely unchallenged vilification of middle easterners here and abroad .
abstract: reel bad arabs takes on hollywood stereotyping
